Name: Common Hanzi Quiz - Simplified Chinese
About the game: A quiz that helps you review common Chinese characters you will come across in everyday text. By practicing and reviewing, you can learn 2,538 Hanzi, their meanings and pronunciations. Features All questions have a timer set between 2 and 20 seconds. Choose how many questions per quiz. From 3 to 30. The following levels are available: 1 to 8 strokes, 9 to 16 strokes, 17 to 24 strokes, any Hanzi from the list or even your own custom list. You can review any Hanzi to check its pinyin or the traditional form. 3 ways to take a quiz: guess a Hanzi's meaning or its pronunciations; Also you can have a word in English and then choose the matching Hanzi. Achievements available to highlight your progress!
